description: Covers main interactions with Trello boards. Managing and moving cards, list interactions, and board activities.

token.description: Trello token generated using your API key (falls back to TRELLO_TOKEN env var)

apiKey.description: Trello API key from https://trello.com/app-key (falls back to TRELLO_API_KEY env var)

boardId.description: ID of the Trello board to interact with (falls back to TRELLO_BOARD_ID env var). Optional for user-specific operations.

capabilities.name: getMyBoards
capabilities.description: Get all boards for the authenticated user (useful for finding board IDs)

capabilities.name: getLists
capabilities.description: Get all lists from the configured board

capabilities.name: getRecentActivity
capabilities.description: Get recent activity from the configured board

capabilities.name: addCard
capabilities.description: Add a new card to a list

capabilities.name: moveCard
capabilities.description: Move a card to a different list

capabilities.name: changeCardMembers
capabilities.description: Change the members of a card

capabilities.name: addList
capabilities.description: Add a new list to the configured board

capabilities.name: getMyCards
capabilities.description: Get cards assigned to the authenticated user
